node.statement: QED: Assemble the complete proof. Combine the definition of the O-slice filtration (nodes 1.1-1.3) with the O-Slice Connectivity Theorem and its proof (nodes 1.6-1.8). The total argument is: define F_O from O, define O-slice cells restricted to F_O, construct filtration by Bousfield localization, and characterize O-slice >= n connectivity by the geometric fixed point condition Phi^H >= floor(n/|H|)-connected for all H in F_O.
